attributes.action: focus spending on those who matter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With all the vast sums of monies being banded around by the media regarding the bail out of banking institution.
And still we have vaulnerable citizens at home,Pension poverty,fuel poverty,child poverty,veteran pension poverty,,benefit poverty,homelessness,NHS crisis,personal debt crisis,repossession of homes,small buisnesses in crissis.....these people dont care about banks being rescued as they have nothing in the bank to be worried about..all they are concerned about is getting by day to day,with all this money all these problems could be rectified and allow these people to have some self respect and dignity,so we petition the Prime Minister to end these poverties now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
